sentences.sContent: When used in our food, heart-healthy olive oil provides an adequate source of fat to prevent dryness.
sentences.sContent_eng: When used in our food, heart-healthy olive oil provides an adequate source of fat to prevent dryness.
sentences.sCn: 橄榄油用于食物中，能提供充足的脂质以防止食物干燥，而不会加重心脏负担。

sentences.sContent: This oil is also excellent for the cold weather, preventing dryness by providing moisture and essential nutrients.
sentences.sContent_eng: This oil is also excellent for the cold weather, preventing dryness by providing moisture and essential nutrients.
sentences.sCn: 这种油在寒冷的季节用也很好，它能提供水分和必需的营养素预防干燥。

sentences.sContent: For some women, this leads to a decrease in sexual desire or arousal, vaginal dryness, or difficulty achieving orgasm.
sentences.sContent_eng: For some women, this leads to a decrease in sexual desire or arousal, vaginal dryness, or difficulty achieving orgasm.
sentences.sCn: 对一些女人来说，这会导致性欲或性兴奋下降、阴道干燥或难以到达高潮。

words.tran: 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的
干燥地；冷淡地；枯燥无味地
烘干机；[助剂] 干燥剂
